channel.title: Vmmazz's Blog
channel.description: Recent blog posts on Vmmazz's Blog

item.title: What Is Happening to Software Development?
item.author: contact@vmmazz.com (Victor Mota Mazzei)
item.description: # A rant from someone inside the industry This post is a personal reflection on what I have experienced — and continue to experience — throughout my career as a backend developer. I believe these issues go beyond my individual experience and reflect a broader problem within software development as a whole. This text represents only my personal opinions. # My journey as a backend developer I have worked in marketing agencies, startups, and consulting companies. Over the years, I have experienced different environments, each with its own dynamics and challenges. However, the focus here is development itself.

item.title: About
item.author: contact@vmmazz.com (Victor Mota Mazzei)
item.description: My name is Victor. I currently work as a senior backend developer in the fintech sector. I have also worked in health cloud and several other fields. I am finishing my degree in Cyber Defense, a subject that has always interested me and continues to fascinate me. I constantly seek to deepen my knowledge in this area, especially alongside programming. On this blog, you will find content related to software development, pentesting, reverse engineering, malware analysis, among many other topics. This is also a personal space where I occasionally post about things I enjoy that are not necessarily related to technology.
